entry.title: New release for Postiz: Image compression
entry.content: • Added compression to images in the client that will solve 99% of the problems people have

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Upload pictures on paste / drag and drop
entry.content: Continuing with minor polishing improvements: - You can drag pictures (multiple) onto the editor, and it will upload them. - You can paste pictures (multiple) onto the editor, and it will upload them. - When uploading a picture from the popup, remove the step of selecting an image; it will be selected automatically.

entry.content: • Added emojies option for the editor Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.13.1...v1.14.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: New Concept: Internal plugs
entry.content:
Added "internal plugs," which allow actions to be taken on an existing post with multiple accounts. The first plugs I created is "repost". If you post something on X, you can get other people to repost it after X amount of time.

What's Changed

  • Internal plugs by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/500

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.14.1...v1.15.1
